t.t-if: widget.pos.config and widget.pos.config.enable_credit and orderline.get_product().id == widget.pos.config.prod_for_payment[0]
widget.pos.config.use_pricelist and order.pricelist != widget.pos.default_pricelist and orderline.get_display_price() != orderline.get_original_price()
widget.pos.config.enable_credit and widget.pos.get_client() and widget.pos.credit_amount and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail() and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail()[0]
widget.pos.config.enable_pos_loyalty and widget.pos.get_cashier().access_pos_loyalty and order.get_client() and order.get_total_loyalty_points() > 0
widget.pos.config.enable_credit and widget.pos.config.receipt_balance and widget.pos.get_client() and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail() and widget.pos.get_order().get_credit_detail()[0]
order.pricelist != widget.pos.default_pricelist and widget.pos.config.use_pricelist and line.price_display != line.original_price()
receipt.client_points or receipt.earned_points or receipt.redeem_points or receipt.total_points > 0
order.pricelist != widget.pos.default_pricelist and widget.pos.config.use_pricelist and line.price_display != line.original_price()
